content.detailedDescription: Two weeks after being at this address i witness trees moving as though there is a huge heavy being moving from one tree to the other but you can not see any visible being but i know this is not caused by the wind!!!I have pictures of strange unreal things i would never had imagined ever seeing in real life except on si-fi stuff. there is something outside in my trees and it is not squirrels, i can feel them watching me and have seen their neon green eyes staring back at me from inside of the trees where they try to hide and blend in with the leaves on the top of the trees. something is definetly wrong here and it really has me frightened when i know something has come into my home and assaulted me with scratches on my back and left a blood red scab at the base of my skull as though it was punctured with a sharp object such as a needle. i know the government knows and other officials here, but i have some proof, got some hair that i know isnot human by no means. i don't know what to do but to reach out to you guys so i won't loose my sanity because never in my wildest dreams would i have ever imagined these things to actually be real and to see one for real it's just too much to try and accept the reality of it, but you know what's the truth. please contact me so i won't feel so alone in this madness.
content.summary: At the address i reside google map my address and saw this image that i knew was not a real tree had  alien entities in and attatched to the tree as though it was a part of the tree but you could see their bugged eyes and body form there are unexplainable

content.detailedDescription: It's nearly 2am and i'm having trouble sleeping. i hear a helicopter fly over our house, which isn't unusual -- there's been a lot of search helicopters around the neighborhood here lately. but usually, you can see floodlights. there were no floodlights this time. i get my mom (i still live with my parents), and from the backyard, we spot these white orb lights moving quickly across the sky. they're a bit above the trees and rooftops. they're arranged in a square, one on each corner, flying in unison. the helicopter was following it in wide loops. it got fairly close to the aircraft it looked like. the white orbs try to head further south, but the helicopter meets it there. and both aircraft, in their wide circles, migrate a little further east. about 20 minutes later, i'm too afraid to keep watching, and i don't even think of taking a picture (i have anxiety). my mom has no clue what it is either, and she heads in. it's been over 50 minutes now, and i still hear the helicopter further north, and a bit further away. i needed to report it, so here i am. a bit frightened. as of writing this, it's come back near my house. not sure i can bring myself to go back out.
content.summary: A helicopter without floodlights was circling these four white orbs. they flew in unison. they kept getting cut off by the helicopter as the flew. it was over my house in the suburbs.

content.detailedDescription:
In august 25 around 1am me and my two friends were going home after a trip to the nearest town. sudenly in the horizon we saw a lot of lights in one location, we tough that it must be some kind of stars or some kind of astronomical event. after a 2-3min those lights were above us moving in one direction without making any sound or other strange movement. so at that moment we thought that it wasnt just random astronomical event. we also noticed that the space between light was way bigger than previously and it looked like a big spaceship of some kind, then the only logical explanation seemed ufo. it was scary and at the same time amazing to look at, we watched as those lights hovered further and now we only saw a lot of lights in one location, same as we saw them at the beggining. after a while those light dissapeared and we simply went home.

p.S sorry for bad english
content.summary: 30+ lights moving slowly in the sky

content.detailedDescription: My nephew went on vacation to mexico. one of the places he visited was zacatecas, mexico. he saw a street sign that had the word "zacatecas" on it, that was located on a small patch of grass in the middle of the street, and thought it would be neat if he could take a picture with him standing next to the sign.  so he had his girlfriend take the picture which she took on her cell phone. after the picture was taken, he ended up posting it on his facebook page a few days later. i saw the picture on facebook and noticed something odd while looking at it. in the picture on the upper left corner was this round silver object that looked out of place. i first thought it was those round things they put on wires to alert airplane pilots about the wires. i thought this because under the object there are visible power lines or telephone wires underneath the object. but as i zoomed in, i could see there wasn't any wires holding this object up. it was up there with nothing attached to it. and i remembered from watching tv programs about ufo's that they showed video of ufo's that looked very similar to the one in the picture. i'm not sure if it's a ufo or not. i was hoping you would be able to tell me. i think it's very possible it could be one but i'm not 100% positive. what do you think?
content.summary: Ufo pictured in zacatecas, mexico

content.detailedDescription: Sitting on our couch looking out the big picture window that faces due west. noticed a vivid flashing light that looked too bright and low to be a star. after using binoculars to get a better look at it, it became clear that it was not a planet/star.  my girlfriend and i watched this light with the binoculars and the naked eye. through the binoculars we witnessed the light flashing and pulsing white, yellow, green, red and blue.  after 15 minutes of watching it flash, it began to dim and seemed to move slightly to the right. after about 5 minutes of it fading, it disappeared completely.
content.summary: Saw stationary flashing lights for 15 minutes. lights appeared to dim for 5 min. then completely disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: Me and two of my friend were driving near a big river when we have seen 8 orange glowing orbs moving randomly. at first i was thinking it was some firework but the 8 orbs was folloing us for a good 15min. their was 8 object in form of sphere glowing a strong orange light. our first reaction was being speechless and try to see them in detail. we were driving and nervous, so all the picture that we take are very bad. but we were not alone to see them , in alma we have seen other persons looking at the orbs. after 15 min, the orbs have star ascending and disappear in the sky.
content.summary: 8 strange orange glowing orbite mouving randomly

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
While i was working i had feeling like there was something weird in the sky. i looked out the window and there it was this glowing object moving around weird making 90 turns fast. i relized once i started to observe it that it was pulsating then it just stopped moving and was just hovering. i realized that for people to believe me this time i have to get it on video. so i took out my phone and started recording it. soon after i started recording it started to mve again in weird motion then it got bright agin and it shut off really fast it disppeared.


this is not my first time i had a sighting. my first sighting that i had that im aware of was few years ago which i reported it to mufon to. i didnt get my first sighting on video as it was more intense i would say because it was much closer. the object was a big and it had to be close because it looked bigger then the moon. it was a fiery red object even the clouds around it were on fire. it was hard to explain it must of heated up the air around it. the people that im close with that i shared my sighting with believe i got abducted but thats another story. i dont think i did and if i did i would like to find the truth and deal with it and get over it.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: It was a glowing oval shape object hovering then it started to move weird right before it got bright again and shut off fast and disappeared

content.detailedDescription: I am sure people will think i am nuts that o.K. i am. but my wife, whom is perfectly normal saw it first!!  but i have to share this. i believe in u.F.O. because there is no doubt i saw one while in iraq on guard duty around 3 a.M. since then i enjoy watching u.F.O. shows. i keep hearing about orbs, which those i am skeptical of especially the ones people see in their house.. last night my wife come in screaming terrified saying something was in grandmas room. there were two balls of light, grapefruit size floating around the room. one seemed to be checking out granny, the other the room itself, even one disappear to the side come back then under the bed and came back. then both rose and the stopped in unison, and a beam of light appeared connecting them, the beam dimmer than they were and they were perfectly still about 12 feet apart 5 feet high, the orbs on each side granny the beam going over her. i for some reason then jumped up told my wife keep watching them grabbed my sons bat in the room in between ours and opened granny's door ready for a fight. nothing was there, granny sat up and ask why i woke her up, and my wife said they vanish as soon as she heard me touch the door knob. we have had this baby monitor, and others before it, for close to 4 years and i have never witnessed anything like this., the fact they moved the whole time, then stopped together only when the beam of light connected them, to me shows intelligence the whole episode lasted minutes, and i went from amazed, looking for a reason, to scared kinda for granny, i feel better now to get this off my chest like u.F.O. i believe in orbs now! i am going to see if the baby monitor recorded this. my wife just told me there were 2 other orbs, but they were very faint and i do not see real well, i only saw the two bright ones in the baby monitor.
content.summary: Baby monitor, wife see, screaming show me, we see 2 orbs granny room. intelligent. then beam connect them. i get scared, go to room, wife says i open door the vanish.

content.detailedDescription: Sitting outside, flashing caught attention, weather balloon, but can't be, slowly moving east, we were wondering what it is, it was so high up we can only see it with binoculars, 4 of us witnessed it. we still have sight of it.
content.summary: Reflective material caught our attention. has flashing lights, too high to be plane or helicopter

content.detailedDescription: On august 24 about 9:30 i took my dog out for a walk. looked back toward our house and saw a flickering light. kind of looked like a star but i knew it was not. so i ran in and got my external zoom lens for my iphone and shot some videos. pretty amazing g videos for an iphone at night. looked like an orb to the bare eye, but when i zoomed in the camera made my jaw drop. there was a glowing saucer shaped ship. hovering but still moving slightly side to side and up and down.  it was amazing.
content.summary: Glowing disc over nw chicago suburb

content.detailedDescription: Huge disc appeared at south to south-east of humacao town in puerto rico. photos are as i took it without cropping or anything. following a sequence of photos, i thought i had none. but when i looked it up on my computer, it appears i got a huge disc appearing and disappearing in less than one second. comming from the cloud to around less than 500 feet and gone.
content.summary: Huge disc appeared at south to south-east of humacao town. photos are as i took it.

content.detailedDescription:
The event occurred in the early 1990s (i cannot say for sure of the exact year). i had picked my sister up from her boyfriend's house and we were returning home, traveling southbound on highway 15, 7-10 miles south of baxley, georgia, approaching the highway's intersection with ben weaver road. the air was cool that night and there were no other vehicles on the highway. what initially caught my attention was an object quickly descending out of the sky, coming in from a westerly direction. at first, i thought the object was a meteor,  since it had those characteristics of one, glowing yellow/red, quickly descending on an angular path to the earth's surface. i pointed the meteor out to my sister and said, "look, a falling star." however, the "falling star" did something we did expect: it changed it's course. within a few hundred feet atop of 150 feet tall pine trees, the falling star leveled off it's trajectory and hovered over the pines trees. there were no sounds, no vapor trails, and no marker lights signifying any clearly defined edges. the exterior was glowing a reddish tone of color; moreover, i could not see any type of structure to suggest conventional engine configuration, at least nothing i have ever seen on an aircraft. the shape of the craft was similar to that of a rectangle, maybe closer to a cigar shape. my sister was scared, very scared, but i was fascinated by what we were witnessing, something which i perceived not to be threatening, rather it was an opportunity to see something no one else has. i accelerated to get a closer look of the object, but my sister objected to getting closer, so i slowed down. the object hovered across highway 15 (west to east), turned to the south, accelerated away. once again, no sound, no engine blasts, vapor trails, and it left at a speed no man-made aircraft could have executed. 

i have never thought to report it, but after viewing a broadcast about mufon, i am reluctantly sending this account for your review. i attest this is a factual account, not a fabrication. i have searched for answers, only to come up empty. hopefully, you can find out what it was. 

if there are any doubts to the veracity of my statement, i submit to whoever is reading it that i am certified law enforcement officer of over 20 years experience. the experience of seeing, first hand, an object i know was not of this earth, fascinates me. 

thanks for taking the time to read this.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Rectangular shaped object, entire surface glowing red, descended out of the sky, hovered across the highway

content.detailedDescription:
I was 21 years old. i was working as a travelling salesman. i was driving a 1964 4 door sedan ford (dark blue in color).
i finished my sales appointments in edmonton alberta canada and my next stop was to be in saskatoon saskatchewan.
i remember thinking if i went to sleep in the late afternoon i could then get up around 11pm and travel to saskatoon and save a days expenses by getting there in the early morning.
so around 10;30 pm i checked out of the mcdonald hotel in edmonton and started to head out to saskatoon.
i remember looking at my gas guage and seing there was around 1/2 a tank left.
i looked for a gas station but could not find one open at that time of night.
i was pulling a u-haul trailer filled with heavy clothing samples and thought i'd have no problem reaching loydminster alberta/saskatchewan. which had an all night trucker stop open 24 hours.
half the town was in alberta and half the town is in saskatchewan.

i then headed out.....The wind was blowing light grains of snow across the barren highway.

i remember reaching a semi trailer....There wasn't a car on the road.
there was a courtesy thing with truckers in those days, when you approached them and flashed you brights on and off they put on their bright lights and you turned your lights totally off until you passed them.

that was the last thing i remember doing!!!

i did not have enough gas to get to saskatoon as its an 8 hour or more trip pulling a u-haul and furthermore i had to keep all gas receipts for my employer. 

the next thing i remember is coming to and awakening to a bright sunny morning. i remember seeing the bright snow that covered the sides of the highway and a sign that said "saskatoon" one mile!!!

i remember feeling amazingly rested and very alert...

however, since that day i began to feel somewhat out of place, like i did not belong??? this feeling to this day has haunted me. i feel as though """something in me is missing"""...I don't know what nor can i explain but i do know i have flashbacks/dreams to floating and being terrified and very confused and to this day i feel like part of me is not supposed to be here??

i dont want to come across as a nut case since its been 54 years ago but thought i'd write you my story because if i shared it with anyone which i have not they would think i was crazy...


thanks for listening...
respectfully
barry goldman
content.summary: Unknown

content.detailedDescription:
Observation was from rear deck of house, using a good pair of 7x50 binoculars.
object first appeared as a dim light adjacent to the star vega (almost directly overhead)  the object appeared to brighten significantly.  then the object translated from what appeared to be a vertical descent to horizontal flight heading due north.  when the first object translated to horizontal, it appeared there was a second (and brighter) object in trail.  the second object followed the first into horizontal flight.  the two objects continued travelling due north until they faded from view behind the trees.  while both object were in view, they kept their exact spacing, in trail, not in "formation".  unfortunately, i am not able to give a worthwhile estimate of altitude - they appeared as "bright lights", nothing more.
i have seen something very similar several months ago, the same "flight pattern", same location, similar time of night.  i do not know the significance of this.
content.summary: Bright light appeared from directly overhead

content.detailedDescription:
I was unloading a truck with my dad and sister when i noticed these  lottle lights in the sky, they appeared  to be looking for something,  when they got to us they  stopped and leveled  off. the objegt body began to change colors in a merging fashion, then the lights around the outside edges also began flashing in color, this happened forabout 20 mins. while this was happening i asked my dad what they were,  he replied that they were helicopters,  he then turned and walked into the house, the other people outside turned and did the exact same thing. the following day none of them even rememberd anything about it. it has bothered me my entire life. 
the object suddenly slightly tilted on its axis and flew  away to the nw at an incredible rate of speed not possible by conventional jet aircraft. 
after it was gone i was left with a feeling of things being off. i didnt mention this for 50 years
content.summary: Object decended to about 100 ft above us where it leveled off andvthe lights began to flash.

content.detailedDescription:
Observing the sky from rear deck of house, using a good pair of 7x50 binoculars.
  object appeared from the nw, travelling at medium speed.  object appeared to brighten then dim, several times becoming invisible, then become visible, then become dimmer, then very bright again.  there was no regular sequence to the "bright and dim"
my impression was that it was an irregular shaped object, that was not rotating, but tumbling.  which also means, to me, that it was high enough to be reflecting sunlight.  
object continued this pattern until it faded from view to the south.

my impression was that it was not an "intelligently controlled craft", but most likely a piece of space debris.
content.summary: Object appeared to be "tumbling".

content.detailedDescription: I went into my backyard to view the solar eclipse, from coos bay or.  i had a digital camera and began taking photos.  the fog was just clearing at 10:am. the moon was in the east.  just below it to the left was what i took to be venus.  as the hour progressed, i made sketches of the moon and my camera photos showed the object i thought was a star, to be in many different positions in relation to the moon, although i stood in the same place and positioned the camera the same, for each photo.The white, round, object was circling the moon in an angular pattern.Lower left, far right, upper right, above, right again, closer in , upper left, lower left then right of the moon.  time between photos was about 10 seconds.I held my arms up and stood in one place and snapped nine  photos in succession.Seven more photos earlier in different positions.  another nine in place.  each photo shows the white disc in another position, in relation to the moon.  in between each photo shoot, i sketched the phase changes of the moon .  made notes about the behavior of birds and bees and animals in my yard.The whole process took about an hour.  at one point i looked at the televised eclipse, but no white disc was visible in their view of it. i would submitt my photos but im not techno savvy and i dont know how to do that with my old computor. perhaps i could print them out and mail them to you.
content.summary: Ufo circling the moon during the solar eclipse aug.21 2017 at 10:15 am to 11:15am

content.detailedDescription: On august 24,2017 i was driving through my jobs parking lot and just thought it would be nice to take a picture of the clouds color. at 7:46pm i took three pictures after taking the pictures i just went to my normal work duties. later on my break i decided to look at the pictures to observe the cloud coloration and noticed the flying object in the pictures.
content.summary: I was just taking pictures of the clouds nothing special, but after i zoomed in my pictures i noticed the unknown object.

content.detailedDescription: I was in my living room listening to music. and smoking a bit of weed on the couch. all of a sudden a beam of light happened simultaneously to buzzing and humming sounds. i remember being lifted off of the couch through the ceiling into the air looking down at my house and freaking out cuz i couldn't get down. was lifted into an opening of what i assume was a ship although the beam of light was so bright i couldnt see much else the closer to it i got. blacked out. woke up laying on something i cant remember what unable to move surrounded by typical grey aliens based on other peoples descriptions. i remember trying to get away from them and them not seeming surprised at all. like they knew me and how i would react to the situation. blacked out again. i never saw the ship at all somehow. cant remember anything else until what i thought was waking up from a dream until my ex at the time who was abusive and kinda stalkerish. very obsessive. starts yelling at me for being gone for 3 hours without telling anyone. i never left. i thought i either smoked laced weed or fell asleep and had a very vivid dream. avoided the topic for two years to avoid being called crazy. i am remembering more and more of prior events before this and am starting to believe this has happened more times than the one i just describes which is the only one i consciously remembered until this year when little bits and pieces of random memories started coming back due to reading many materials about abductions ufos etc. and finding much of the information very familiar when i knew it shouldnt be.
content.summary: Taken from couch through ceiling and into air by beam of light so bright could not make out ship. unable to move laying on something surrounded by greys. all i remember.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting outside with a friend making jokes when some blinking lights caught my attention and i just sat there staring at the sky and pointed to the sky asking my friend "what is that?" it didn't have any color lights like on a plane so i asked if it could be a satellite he replied with no so we just watched it, trying to figure out what it was and we noticed it was slowly changing direction it wasn't going straight. after we got up to follow it i noticed from the reflection of its own lights the shape reminded me of my kids fidget spinner and asked my friend if he see that too which he agreed it did look like a fidget spinner with lights floating across the night sky. sadly none of our camera phones would pick it up.
content.summary: Looked like a fidget spinner with flashing lights

content.detailedDescription: I was at sweetwater, tn for the solar eclipse.I was checking out the sun with my solar lenses when i notice the three lights in the sky.I watch them for about 30 secs they seemed to be hovering.I turn away and did not think about it. later on in the day my feelings though about ufo.Will send you a copy of this report with a sketch.
content.summary: 3 lights hovering

content.detailedDescription:
I was on my local field. beautiful sunny day. a few clouds. excellent visibilty. 

i was looking up when i noticed an extremely fast moving point of light. i was amazed and kept my gaze very firmly on this object until after about 5 or 6 seconds it had traversed the whole sky and was at the limit of my vision. it was so far now it was simply too far to see.

there was no sound at all. object was simply a round light. very high, much bigger than a star. flight path seemed erratic at the final 2-3 secs. 

hard to judge the speed. based on planes at height this was perhaps 10 times faster? a few thousand mph i would have thought. 

it was not a meteor, no trail, seemed to be flying under control. i was aware my good camera phone was a few paces away, but at the speed this was going, i had zero time but to observe, which i carefully did.

interestingly a few minutes before this fast object, i noted with interest 2 very high slow.Moving lights which i filmed and observed for several minutes. one was going from bright to invisible for several cycles. i am at loss to say what these were, i guessed some sort of balloon? i got disinterested watching them.Very odd that a few minutes later i saw this fast moving ufo.

this is my first ever seen ufo where i have no doubt it was something unexplainable. it was awesome!
content.summary: Very high and extremely fast moving point of light. est. speed 2000-3000 mph. my first ever ufo. astonished.

content.detailedDescription:
Ma fille 11 ans s'est filme hier soir au ralenti dans le jardin alors qu'elle jouait
lorsqu'elle est visionne sa vido elle m'a alerte sur  le fait que quelque chose traverse l'horizon  toute vitesse alors que tout est au ralenti. 
je vous joins un extrait car la vido est plus longue. si vous la dsirez la en entir je vous l'enverrai 

pour l'anecdote, juste avant ces faits, elle me racontait un vnement qu'elle a vecu chez ses grands parents. tant elle mme trs sensitive elle a senti la prsence d'une entit dans une maison et a pris peur. elle n'osait pas m'en parler mme si moi aussi je vis ce genre de phnomne car elle avait peur que je ne la crois pas 
je lui ai dit rpondu "mme si tu avais vu un ovni, je te croirai,". 
une heure aprs elle me montrait sa vido.   sacre synchronicitee 

personnellement je pense qu'il s'agit d'un gros insecte mais pourquoi irait il plus vite que la vitesse de la vido ?
je vous remercie pour vos recherches 
valrie
content.summary: Objet traversant le ciel  grande vitesse alors que la vido est pris au ralenti

content.detailedDescription:
I was peeing and as i left the bathroom i heard noise coming from outside which i then decided to record with my phone
 only recorded about a minute of it because i felt paranoia when outside
content.summary: Didn't visually see anything but i heard a loud beeping ringing noise for almost an hour

content.detailedDescription: I was walking out of a garage while talking to a friend, happened to look up like i usually do but this time saw a couple of dim orange lights moving in a straightline. i noticed the object was cigar shaped as the lights were on either end. at first i thought it was an airplane or helicopter, however this was silent. absolutely no noise came from it. all it did was fly in a straight line, i lost sight of it when it flew over the other houses. i had no fear or any 'bad' feelings during or after seeing the object, just surpised as i was not expecting to see anything.
content.summary: Silent cigar shaped object flying in straight line with 2 orange lights.

content.detailedDescription: Was outside my home to go smoke a cigarette. had noticed a strange light in the sky that was flashing white, red and green lights. at first before it started flashing lights, thought maybe it was a star. saw it one night, then the next night it wasn't there but then it was there again tonight. it was shooting in different directions diagonally really fast. it had flashing lights of red, white and green. could also see that it was going around in circles, then went back to zig zagging. while watching it, it shot out a beam of light randomly. also noticed there was a couple more of these flashing lights in the sky. while watching it, some of the times the lights would stop flashing as if it disappeared and then came back on at a higher elevation. sometimes it seemed it was getting closer and then it was going further away. i am a believer and have been my while life. my reaction when i saw it, was like, what is that? then i had went online and saw other videos of ufo sightings and the lights and how it moved was exact to i saw. only time i would lose sight was when the lights stopped flashing for a couple seconds and then you could see it again at a higher elevation. it would go higher and lower in elevation, swaying back and forth as if it was studying or examining life on earth.
content.summary: Flashing white,red, green lights, flying in different directions zig zag across the sky

content.detailedDescription:
My wife  posted a picture on facebook that she said was one of her favorite photos i noticed in the background in the clouds a strange object, not sure what it is so i thought i'd send it. 
it looks likethe millennial falcon from star millennial falcon from star wars but all in light. 
i know this is a photo and i'm not an eye witness during the taking of the photo, but it is an amazing looking photo of something. i'm hoping you can shed some light on this photo of amazing looking photo of something. i'm hoping you can shed some light on this photo of light. if you need anything more feel free to call.
content.summary: Photo wife sent. i noticed something strange in the background. thought i should send it to you.

content.detailedDescription:
Boulevard street.
spraying insect spray at front light.
plane.
red orange then went to a dot then reappeared same size and color. moving east.
holy cow! what the heck is that?
jumped on mufon right away after i witnessed the object.
lost sight after  moving east hitting the tree lines,
content.summary: Red orange diamond shape. no sound. got small like dot then grew to same color. never saw anything like it.

content.detailedDescription: On august 26th at about 8:20pm i was driving from cornersville tn to lewisburg tn to get some takeout. approximately two miles from the bypass into lewisburg i came around a corner to find several cars stopped in the middle of the road. thinking it was an accident i just stopped and started to wait. i noticed that several people were standing outside their cars looking up. i got out of my car to see what they were looking at and saw the object in the sky. it was a very bright object with an orange hue. it was at least 3 to 4 miles away from us and looked to be about the size of golf ball at that distance. i would have guessed it to be about 30 to 40 feet across close up. the object was not moving and i heard no sound from it's direction. we all stood out there watching it for about 15 minutes. the object moved very quickly to one side, made several quick flashes and then made a very rapid assent, so fast that it looked like a light streak going strait up and then disappearing. one of the other people on site said he had been watching it for almost half an hour.
content.summary: Very bright, hovering in sky. 10 to 15 cars stopped watching it. very fast vertical assent.

content.detailedDescription: See above for discriptikn
content.summary: Green neon light about size of golfball streaked low across sky around 200 yard space from house and less than 1/8 mile up from field traveling at fast constant speed and the best neon green light suddenly disappeared right before treeline
